caller_intent: Existing policyholder Jamie wants to add their daughter to their auto policy before she takes her driver's test on January 13th, ensuring coverage is active for the test.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the policy details (Auto Owners, address, active policy).
Agreed to add the daughter effective January 12th as a rated driver.
Explained the new North Carolina law extending the inexperienced operator surcharge to 8 years (previously 3 years).
Notified Jamie about potential future rate adjustments post-July 1, 2025, and upcoming 7.5% rate increase in 2026.
knowledge_required: North Carolina auto insurance laws (inexperienced operator surcharge changes effective July 1, 2025)
Policy renewal dates and rate adjustment timelines
summary: Jamie, an existing policyholder, needed to add their daughter to their auto policy before her driver's test. The agent facilitated the addition, explained the extended 8-year inexperienced operator surcharge under new NC law, and outlined upcoming rate changes. The call concluded with the policy update and full disclosure of legal and financial implications.
